P. falciparum Cross Project Data

Source: R/data.R
pfcross_subset.Rd

A variant call file (vcf) that contains SNPs on chromosome 1 for the 3D7 and HB3 parents and the F1 progeny, C01 and C14.

pfcross_subset

Format

A vcf containing 4 samples and 100 biallelic SNPs

A vcfRobject with 3 samples and 100 biallelic SNPs

This file was generated with the following code: url <- "ftp://ngs.sanger.ac.uk/production/malaria/pf-crosses/1.0/3d7_hb3.combined.final.vcf.gz" destfile <- "~/Desktop/temp/temp.vcf.gz" httr::GET(url=url, httr::write_disk(path=destfile, overwrite = F)) vcfRobject <- vcfR::read.vcfR(file=destfile) vcfRobject <- vcfR::extract.indels(vcfRobject[vcfR::is.biallelic(vcfRobject)], return.indels = F) # subset to SNPs vcfRobject <- vcfRmanip::vcfR2SubsetChrom(vcfRobject = vcfRobject, chromvect = "Pf3D7_01_v3") pfcross_subset <- vcfRobject[, c("FORMAT", "3D7/PG0051-C/ERR019061", "HB3/PG0052-C/ERR019054", "C04/PG0061-C/ERR019059", "C02/PG0053-C/ERR019067")]

Source

ftp://ngs.sanger.ac.uk/production/malaria/pf-crosses/1.0/3d7_hb3.combined.final.vcf.gz

Warning

If you copy and paste the code below, it will write to your Desktop/temp directory (if it exists).

Dependencies

To generate this subsetted VCF, we used the NFBtools package which is freely available from GitHub with devtools::install_github("nickbrazeau/NFBtools")

Citation

This VCF has generously been made publicly available by the MalariaGEN Consortium and the P. falciparum Genetic Cross project led by Alistair Miles. The manuscript is available through NCBI (PMID 27531718).

Contents

Developed by Nicholas F. Brazeau, Robert Verity.
